data.title: Obituary of Barry Dwight Davis | Benefield Funeral Home
data.meta_description: Graveside services for Barry Dwight Davis, age 75, of Douglasville, Georgia, will be held on Tuesday, May 9, 2023, at 2:00 PM at Taylor’s Crossroads
data.text:
Obituary of Barry Dwight Davis

Graveside services for Barry Dwight Davis, age 75, of Douglasville, Georgia, will be held on Tuesday, May 9, 2023, at 2:00 PM at Taylor’s Crossroads Church of Christ Cemetery.

The family will receive friends at the funeral home from 5:00-8:00 PM on Monday.

Mr. Davis passed away Friday, May 5, 2023, at Wellstar Tranquility Hospice in Austell, Georgia.

Survivors include his wife, Deborah Davis; daughter, Kristin Howard of Douglasville, GA.; son, B.J. Davis of Douglasville, GA; grandchildren, Daisy Davis, Breydon Davis, and Ryder Howard; sister, Donna Sue Richardson (David) of Brooks, Ga.; nieces, Tracy Slagel, Rosemary White, and Heather Scott; and nephew, Zack Shiflett.

Mr. Davis was born in Pell City, Alabama, on January 20, 1948, the son of Dwight and Clary Elizabeth West Davis. He worked as an electrician for West Georgia Electric and enjoyed spending time with his family. Mr. Davis was preceded in death by his parents.

Memorials may be floral. Online condolences may be expressed at www.benefieldfhwedowee.com.
